agents.name: Atlas
agents.description: Your main AI agent. Manages email triage, meeting prep, task coordination, calendar management, and daily briefings. Always on, always working.

agents.name: Cipher
agents.description: Deep-dive research, competitive intelligence, market analysis, and due diligence. Monitors industry news and surfaces actionable insights.

agents.name: Prism
agents.description: Manages social media presence, drafts thought leadership content, monitors brand mentions, and tracks engagement metrics across platforms.
